ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol
Class MainConnection

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.AbstractConnection
      ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.MainConnection

public class MainConnection
extends AbstractConnection

Wrapper/Decorator class around a Channel. The MainConnection is the main connection between two peers. All basic communication except the document editing session goes over the main connection. Note that all instances of MainConnection use the same MainRequestHandler instance to handle the received requests.

See Also:
MainRequestHandler, org.beepcore.beep.core.Channel

Method Detail

close

public void close()
Closes the main connection. The state of the channel must be STATE_ACTIVE in order to close it. Otherwise it is ignored.

cleanup

public void cleanup()
Cleans up this connection and frees any resources.

Specified by:
cleanup in class AbstractConnection

recover

public void recover()
             throws RecoveryException
Recovers this connection from a dirty state (e.g. exception thrown when sending data). After calling this method the transmission of the data is tried again.

Specified by:
recover in class AbstractConnection
Throws:
RecoveryException - if the recovery fails
